TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {213502=Mcnally Bh Engg is in the Engineering sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 394.17 crore. The company management includes Prasanta Kumar Chandra - Whole Time Director & COO, Prabir Ghosh - WholeTime Director & CFO, Aditya Khaitan - Director, Virendra Kumar Verma - Director, Utsav Parekh - Director, Amirtanshu Khaitan - Director, Asim Kumar Barman - Director, Puranam Hayagreeva Ravikumar - Director, Subir Ranjan Dasgupta - Director, Nandini Khaitan - Additional Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532629 and the NSE with an NSE Code of MBECL. Its Registered office is at 4, Mangoe Lane, 7th Floor, Kolkata,West Bengal - 700001. Their Registrars are Maheshwari Datamatics (P) Ltd., 135058=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 134351=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 133840=28 July 2015, 212191=Zensar Technologies Recommended on Mar 24th 2015}
